dcterms:creator: Antoine Louis
Gerasimos Spanakis
dcterms:description: The Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD) consists of over 1,100 French native legal questions labeled by experienced jurists with relevant articles from a corpus of 22,600+ Belgian law articles. It aims to facilitate the task of statutory article retrieval by providing a benchmark for evaluating retrieval models.
dcterms:title: Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD)

dcterms:creator: Fawei et al.
dcterms:description: A legal question answering (LQA) dataset with 400 multi-choice questions based on the US national bar exam.
dcterms:title: Legal Question Answering (LQA) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Zhong et al.
dcterms:description: An LQA dataset based on the Chinese bar exam consisting of 26,365 multiple-choice questions, along with a database of evidence that includes 3,382 Chinese legal provisions.
dcterms:title: LQA Dataset based on the Chinese Bar Exam

dcterms:creator: Duan et al.
dcterms:description: A legal reading comprehension dataset with 52,000 question-answer pairs crafted on the fact descriptions of 10,000 cases from the Supreme Peopleâ€™s Court of China.
dcterms:title: Legal Reading Comprehension Dataset

dcterms:creator: Xiao et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset for legal judgment prediction (LJP) with around 2.68 million Chinese criminal cases annotated with 183 law articles and 202 charges.
dcterms:title: Legal Judgment Prediction (LJP) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Rabelo et al.
dcterms:description: The COLIEE Statute Law Corpus comprises 696 questions from the Japanese legal bar exam labeled with references to relevant articles from the Japanese Civil Code.
dcterms:title: COLIEE Statute Law Corpus
